ach-: I am not highly motivated to succeed.
I do just enough work to get by.
act-: I like to take it easy.
I like to take my time.
adv+: I like to visit new places.
adv-: I am attached to conventional ways.
I am a creature of habit.
alt+: I have a good word for everyone.
alt-: I turn my back on others.
ang+: I am often in a bad mood.
anx+: I get caught up in my problems.
anx-: I adapt easily to new situations.
I am not easily disturbed by events.
art+: I see beauty in things that others might not notice.
art-: I do not enjoy watching dance performances.
ass+: I can talk others into doing things.
ass-: I wait for others to lead the way.
cau+: I choose my words with care.
cau-: I jump into things without thinking.
I like to act on a whim.
con+: I only feel comfortable with friends.
con-: I am not bothered by difficult social situations.
dis+: I get chores done right away.
dut+: I try to follow the rules.
eff+: I am sure of my ground.
I excel in what I do.
emo+: I enjoy examining myself and my life.
emo-: I don't understand people who get emotional.
I experience very few emotional highs and lows.
exc+: I enjoy being part of a loud crowd.
exc-: I would never go hang gliding or bungee jumping.
fri-: I am not really interested in others.
I am hard to get to know.
gre+: I involve others in what I am doing.
I enjoy being part of a group.
ima+: I like to get lost in thought.
ima-: I seldom get lost in thought.
imm+: I don't know why I do some of the things I do.
I do things I later regret.
imm-: I am able to control my cravings.
int+: I can handle a lot of information.
I love to read challenging material.
int-: I am not interested in abstract ideas.
lib+: I believe that there is no absolute right or wrong.
I believe that criminals should receive help rather than punishment.
lib-: I like to stand during the national anthem.
I believe that too much tax money goes to support artists.
mod+: I seldom toot my own horn.
mod-: I make myself the center of attention.
I believe that I am better than others.
mor+: I would never cheat on my taxes.
mor-: I know how to get around the rules.
ord+: I do things according to a plan.
ord-: I am not bothered by disorder.
sym-: I try not to think about the needy.
I tend to dislike soft-hearted people.
tru+: I think that all will be well.
